attributes.action: Stop the shooting/hunting of birds in Malta
attributes.background: This is a serious problem with migrating birds.  The turtle dove is in serious decline due to the hunting in this country. There needs to be a ban on this now

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition as the UK Government and Parliament don't have the power to take this action in Malta. You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to raise this issue with the government of Malta.
